item.title: c.rangeLevelReq?
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

(I’m not a professional at Java, and have not been working on private servers much, and I do not know your source. So I’ll try and help lol)

c.prayerLevelReq

the part before the dot ‘c’ is an object that was made.
You need to look for where the person constructed the ‘c’ object. It is somewhere inside the ItemAssistant.java class.

(classname) c = new (classname)();

I don’t know what class ‘c’ is connected to, so when you find the block of code where the object was constructed. The class is the first part of the code (classname) So look for that class inside your source.

Then you need to find where attackLevelReq, or defenceLevelReq, etc. are all made. Based off how they are made you should be able to make prayer.

Read full topic
